This is because currently only ProjectResolver is available in WST,
and this can handle only resources in the workspace, this happens.
WST has FileBufferManager#ExternalURIResolver, and we need the exact
same class(code), so we need to make it public.

.

FileBufferManager#ExternalURIResolver implements a deprecated API that we want
to be rid of in the future.  You should be able make your own copy of the
necessary functionality without any trouble.
Do I remember right? That this has been resolved. Anything else needed from us?
